articles.author: Robin Schmidt
articles.description:
Welcome to a very special edition of the Defiant Weekly as we get to joust with one of the most mercurial talents in the crypto space. As the CEO and co-founder of eToro he has probably done more than anyone to bring retail investors into trading with innovations like fractional shares and commission-free trading. Back …
  Could Good Dollar Be Crypto’s Answer to Ubi? With Yoni Assia (eToro’s CEO) Read More »
articles.title: Could Good Dollar Be Crypto’s Answer to Ubi? With Yoni Assia (eToro’s CEO)
